title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Basic concepts of productivity, definitions, productivity cycle, phases of productivity management productivity and organizational performance, issues of productivity management in manufacturing and service organizations, organizations for productivity management, productivity measurement and evaluation models (mathematical and others), performance indices for various operations, comparative analysis, productivity- profit model, managerial productivity, productivity planning methodology and its application, productivity improvement tools and their use, manpower planning for direct and indirect workforce, theories of human motivation, methods of improving materials and capital productivity, implementation of productivity projects. White Collar productivity measurements and evaluation techniques, inter-term productivity analysis, productivity issues in service sectors, comprehensive measurement and improvement methodology, performance assessment over time, case studies, exercises.Books1Production Systems, Planning Analysis and Control, James L.
